snippet.title: Why is Syria using chemical weapons
snippet.description: Because they're cheap, effective and don't destroy roads, houses or equipment.

snippet.title: Can we be affected as far as the US if Syria uses chemical weapons
snippet.description: No, chemical weapons disperse quickly within a short distance of the release point
